page.prototype: L Load (Connection as SQL::Connection [, TableInfo as SQL::TableInfo [, EventScript as C] ])
page.description: Load definitions and data from a table in an open database connection.
page.discussion: Returns true if the load succeeded and false if an error occurred.

argument.name: Connection
argument.description: An explicit, open AlphaDAO connection string to the database.

argument.name: TableInfo
argument.description: Optional. A SQL::TableInfo object that is used as a reference to create the snapshot.

argument.name: EventScript
argument.description: Optional. A string that contains an Xbasic event script that is executed when an event is triggered during the operation. See [DatabaseSnapshot Events] for additional information.
